sections.heading: Transfer of State School Reform/redesign Office From Department of Technology, Management, and Budget to Department of Education; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties Transferred From Superintendent of Public Instruction to State School Reform/redesign Office Under Executive Reorganization Order No
sections.text: Transfer of State School Reform/redesign Office From Department of Technology, Management, and Budget to Department of Education; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties Transferred From Superintendent of Public Instruction to State School Reform/redesign Office Under Executive Reorganization Order No. 2015-2, MCL 18.445, to Superintendent of Public Instruction.
